file_content.text: Bridge shouldn't be too much further.
Ow! I thought spies had finesse.
This cannon wasn't made for two people!
Just move!
Well, that's not good.
What now?
I've got good news and bad news. Which do you want to hear first?
Theron, we don't have time--
I'm an optimistic guy, so we'll start with the good: Arcann's fleet has stopped shooting at us.
And the bad?
They're about to fire on you. Oh, and the omnicannon's broken. Not my fault.
This was SCORPIO's plan all along. Get you and Arcann in one place to kill you both.
And we've rendered his ship defenseless.
We're making it easy for her.
We knew she didn't warn us out of the goodness of her heart.
Figured as much.
When I get my hands on that droid...
I can't wait to kill SCORPIO.
I'll help you deactivate her.
SCORPIO knows how we operate. Probably anticipated we'd sabotage the ship.
It doesn't matter. Our plan remains the same: defeat Arcann and destroy the flagship. This just speeds up our timetable a bit.
That would require SCORPIO having a heart.
